item.title: Valerie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "You must have a cigarette. A cigarette is the perfect type of a perfect pleasure. It is exquisite, and it leaves one unsatisfied. What more can one want?" -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Valerie add a quote by Its a Wonderful Life
item.description: "George Bailey, I'll love you 'til the day I die." -- Its a Wonderful Life

item.title: Valerie add a quote by Andy Warhol
item.description: "I always run into strong women who are looking for weak men to dominate them." -- Andy Warhol

item.title: Valerie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "It is only shallow people who do not judge by appearances. The true mystery of the world is the visible, not the invisible...." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Valerie add a quote by Vincent van Gogh
item.description: "I know well that healing comes-if one is brave-from within, through profound resignation to suffering and death, through the surrender of your own will and of your self-love. But that is of no use to me; I love to paint, to see people and things and everything that makes our life-artificial, if you like. Yes, real life would be a different thing, but I do not belong to that category of souls who are ready to live and also at any moment to suffer. I am everything but courageous in sorrow, and everything but patient when I am not feeling well, though I have rather a good deal of patience in keeping to my work." -- Vincent van Gogh

item.title: Valerie add a quote by Niels Bohr
item.description: "Those who are not shocked when they first come across quantum theory cannot possibly have understood it." -- Niels Bohr
